patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: init-sysctl
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmnb=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmax=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.shmmax=68719476736

          sysctl -w kernel.shmall=4294967296

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w fs.file-max=100000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=0

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=30000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_window_scaling=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamp=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_sack=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=htcp

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time=60

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_wait=10

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established=300

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_generic_timeout=300

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=2000000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=10

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl=15

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes=5

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          runAsNonRoot: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      containers:
      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '3'
            memory: 12G
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: google-cloud-key
          mountPath: /var/secrets/google
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8081
        - name: prom-metrics
          containerPort: 8080
        env:
        - name: BANIAS_PROJECTID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PROJECTID
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_DEBUG
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_TOPIC
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_TOPIC
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          runAsNonRoot: true
      volumes:
      - name: google-cloud-key
        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established=300

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.9.5
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: openshift-monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.9.5
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --host=127.0.0.1
        - --port=8081
        - --telemetry-host=127.0.0.1
        - --telemetry-port=8082
        - --metric-blacklist=kube_secret_labels
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.9.5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 2m
            memory: 40Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: volume-directive-shadow
          readOnly: false
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:8443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8081/
        - --tls-cert-file=/etc/tls/private/tls.crt
        - --tls-private-key-file=/etc/tls/private/tls.key
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https-main
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 40Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/tls/private
          name: kube-state-metrics-tls
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:9443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8082/
        - --tls-cert-file=/etc/tls/private/tls.crt
        - --tls-private-key-file=/etc/tls/private/tls.key
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-self
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: https-self
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 40Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/tls/private
          name: kube-state-metrics-tls
          readOnly: true
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: volume-directive-shadow
      - name: kube-state-metrics-tls

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: label-sync
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: label-sync
            image: gcr.io/k8s-prow/label_sync:v20200608-16190316cf
            args:
            - --config=/etc/config/labels.yaml
            - --confirm=true
            - --orgs=kubernetes,kubernetes-client,kubernetes-csi,kubernetes-incubator,kubernetes-sigs
            - --token=/etc/github/oauth
            volumeMounts:
            - name: oauth
              mountPath: /etc/github
              readOnly: true
            - name: config
              mountPath: /etc/config
              readOnly: true
            securityContext:
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              privileged: false
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              runAsNonRoot: true
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 100m
                memory: 128Mi
              limits:
                cpu: 500m
                memory: 256Mi
          volumes:
          - name: oauth
            secret:
              secretName: oauth-token
          - name: config
            configMap:
              name: label-config
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: 0 0 * * *
